public class EvaluationController
extends java.lang.Object

      • findAll

        @RequestMapping(value="/vp/grade/all",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<Grade> findAll()
        Returns absolutely all grades for only the most coarsely-grained reporting. Useful for feeding data into application for statistical analyses, such as regression analysis, calculating mean, and finding average ;)
        Parameters:
        traineeId -
        Returns:

      • findByAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="/all/grades/assessment/{assessmentId}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<Grade> findByAssessment(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long assessmentId)
        Returns grades for all trainees that took a particular assignment. Great for finding average/median/highest/lowest grades for a test
        Parameters:
        assessmentId -
        Returns:

      • findByWeek

        @RequestMapping(value="/all/grades/batch/{batchId}/week/{week}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<Grade>>> findByWeek(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer batchId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer week)
        Returns grades for all trainees in the batch on a given week. Used to load grade data onto the input spreadsheet, as well as tabular/chart reporting.
        Parameters:
        batchId -
        week -
        Returns:

      • findByTrainer

        @RequestMapping(value="/all/grade/trainer/{trainerId}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<Grade> findByTrainer(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer trainerId)
        Returns all grades issued as acting trainer or cotrainer to a batch. Useful for calculating coarsely-grained data for reporting. Potential refactor here.. this queries database twice where we could find way to simply join.
        Parameters:
        trainerId -
        Returns:
